Title: A look at the open source annotation toolkit | GitHub Checkout
Description:
In this episode of GitHub Checkout, we explore the Annotation Toolkit, a Figma library designed to make designer-to-developer handoffs more seamless. Learn how this open source tool helps designers, developers, and PMs collaborate more effectively by adding crucial context directly to design files. See it in action in our quick demo!

#Developer #Designer #OpenSource

— CHAPTERS —

00:00 - Introduction: bridging design and code 00:21 - What is the annotation toolkit? 00:42 - Demo: adding annotations in Figma 01:56 - Accessibility features and built-in guidance 02:34 - Why clear design intent matters 04:38 - Explore the open source repository 05:45 - Why developers (and designers) need this 06:51 - How to contribute and get started
